author: Tim O’Neil
title: 75 years ago: The Post-Dispatch brings St. Louis its first regular TV broadcast

sentence: State Treasurer Scott Fitzpatrick has twice backed efforts to hire a company to review the spending surrounding the state’s effort to help convince Rams owner Stan Kroenke and his National Football League colleagues to keep the team in Missouri.
author: Kurt Erickson
title: Bid to review failed Rams rescue plan fizzling after two false starts

sentence: For full disclosure, I co-host the afternoon show with former Missouri Speaker Tim Jones and our exceptional executive producer Katie Fitzpatrick.
author: Susie Moore
title: YouTube Strikes Again: Conservative St. Louis Radio Station NewsTalkSTL Gets the Boot

author: Kevin C. Johnson
title: With documentaries in the works — including on her trailblazing grandmother — KVtheWriter is back onstage
